data.message: I'm sure IM gonna get flamed about this but I hate rap!!  There is only one rapper I listen to and that's this guy!!!  I love Marshell Mathers!!!  Truth spoken from the heart and how much more pure can you be!!!  He don't give a shit what others think he stays true to himself!!  I cant call too many "boys" actual men but Eminem is all man baby!!! His family comes first and that is what life is all about!  The rest of everyone else is so trivial.  Keep kickin ass there Marshell!!!  <3  ya lots
